card.title: Disco Inferno (c) def. Lash LeRoux — WCW Cruiserweight Championship
Harlem Heat def. Filthy Animals (Billy Kidman & Konnan) and The First Family (Brian Knobbs & Hugh Morrus) (w/ Jimmy Hart) — Street Fight for the vacant WCW World Tag Team Championship
Eddie Guerrero def. Perry Saturn by DQ
Brad Armstrong def. Berlyn (w/ The Wall)
Rick Steiner def. Chris Benoit (c) — WCW World Television Championship
The Total Package (Lex Luger) (w/ Elizabeth) def. Bret Hart
Sting (c) def. Hulk Hogan — WCW World Heavyweight Championship (angle; 3 seconds)
Goldberg def. Sid Vicious (c) by TKO — WCW United States Heavyweight Championship
Diamond Dallas Page (w/ Kimberly) def. Ric Flair
